definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
solemn/reverent/calm/burial position in an ancestral tomb (old)/old variant of 默

sentences.english: Chad blames Khartoum for backing the rebel Union of Resistance Forces.
sentences.chinese: 乍得指責喀土穆支持叛軍抵抗力量聯盟。

sentences.english: This policy is based on the experience of the RDF within Khartoum state.
sentences.chinese: 該政策依據的是喀土穆州的藥品週轉基金經驗。

sentences.english: A machine gun obtained by Mahdi forces, now exhibiting in Al Khalifa Museum.
sentences.chinese: 陳列於喀土穆哈里發博物館的機槍。

sentences.english: Laboratory results from three cases in Khartoum state have been found negative for RVF.
sentences.chinese: 喀土穆州3個病例的實驗室結果發現是裂谷熱陰性。

sentences.english: So can Sudan's marginalized peripheries unite against Khartoum?
sentences.chinese: 因此可以團結起來，反對喀土穆蘇丹的邊緣化邊緣？

sentences.english: But the view from Khartoum is, as ever, utterly different.
sentences.chinese: 但喀土穆的觀點確實全然不同的。

sentences.english: Beautiful five-star hotel located in Khartoum, the capital of Sudan.
sentences.chinese: 位於蘇丹首都喀土穆美麗的的五星級酒店。

sentences.english: Some say this has cemented China's relationship with Khartoum.
sentences.chinese: 有的人說，這鞏固了中國與喀土穆的關係。

definition: Sudan/sultan (ruler of some Muslim states, esp. Ottoman Emperor)
Dar es Salaam (former capital of Tanzania)
pinyin: Da2 lei4 si1 Sa4 la1 mu3
